| HistoryText             = After the break-up of [[China Force (Earth-616)|China Force]], the Chinese government established the People's Defense Force, composed of the country's most powerful meta-humans. However they were easily defeated by both the Inhuman known only as the [[Unspoken (Earth-616)|Unspoken]], and minutes later by [[Jonathan Walker (Earth-616)|US Agent]] and [[Pietro Maximoff (Earth-616)|Quicksilver]], who had arrived to investigate the rumors of a China/Inhuman alliance. 

The People's Defense Force later tried to apprehend the [[Royal Inhuman Diplomatic Mission (Earth-616)|Royal Inhuman Diplomatic Mission]] as they were trying to investigate a Skyspear in China.{{r|All-New Inhumans #5}}
